Package model.solver

Class Node

  • java.lang.Object
    • model.solver.Node

  • public class Node
extends java.lang.Object
    Node's class

    A Node represents a node from the grid modelized by the AI. It is affiliated to the Case a the same coordinates.

    See Also:
    Case, Board
